name: Classic Tiramisu
description: Italian coffee-flavored dessert with mascarpone and ladyfingers

instructions.description: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until pale and thick
Whip cream to soft peaks and fold into mascarpone mixture
Dip ladyfingers in espresso and arrange in dish
Spread half the mascarpone cream over ladyfingers
Repeat with another layer of ladyfingers and cream
Dust with cocoa powder and refrigerate 4 hours

advance_prep: Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving
